# AVCaptureDevice.FocusMode.autoFocus

**Case**

A mode that automatically adjusts the focus one time, and then locks focus.

## Declaration

```swift
case autoFocus
```

## Focus modes

- **AVCaptureDevice.FocusMode.locked**: A mode that locks device focus.
- **AVCaptureDevice.FocusMode.continuousAutoFocus**: A mode that continuously monitors focus and autofocuses when necessary.

items.description: A mode that locks device focus.
